title: Love Unto Waste/Dei ha ching(1986) Cantonese
description:
Love Unto Waste / Dei ha ching


Year: 1986
Country: Hong Kong
Genre: Drama
Duration: 1:33:01
Color	Color
Language:Cantonese

Subject	Women / Love / Sex / Murder / Detective



Directed by: Stanley Kwan Kam-Pang

Cast: Tony Leung Chiu Wai, Irene Wan, Elaine Kam, Chow Yun Fat, Tsai Chin, etc.

Description: The film's protagonist - a young playboy Tony (Tony Leung) accidentally meets with three girls rotating in the world of show business and trying to achieve popularity. The four of them have a good time and getting wasted their lives in Hong Kong mid-80s, not knowing that soon they are all very cool change ...


The film was shown at the Locarno International Film Festival and the HKMA has received 2 awards for Best Screenplay and Best Supporting Actress

First class (melo) drama with unusual twists, nice script and great actor's work. Highlights Chow Yun Fat in the form of an eccentric and annoying investigator, Elaine Kam (received for this movie award HK film awards) and Tony Leung in probably his first serious role. Stanley Kwan shot his film with a clear eye on the work of directors such as Alfred Hitchcock and Michelangelo Antonioni.
